resources.string: Mohamed Salah The Best Of England Pro

Never show again
Application Guide
Images Filters: You can apply these filters to images, you should use level to specify the filter level you want- levels between 1 to 25 and you can reset image from menu

Creating your image with gallery: You can make your own image using layers list you have two layers top and bottom you can get them from gallery or shapes or both you can apply unlimited zoom in-out and change position to them as you want then click camera button (below screen) to create your image.

Creating your image with camera: You can make your own image using camera and shapes also you can apply unlimited zoom in-out and change position to shapes as you want then press camera button (below screen) then wait about 3 seconds to create your image.

Shapes: These are a different shapes of your player image help you to create your own image and shapes list related to the image which you selected from images list and every image have 4 shapes so to change shapes back-select other image -menu-new then you will get another shapes.

We trying to make this application a completed images application and here its features and how to use them. 
 1.Most of features depending on touch like(switch between images/zoom in-out/..etc) 
 2.We trying to use image recognition instead of letters recognition meaning (most buttons you can know its features by its shape only) 
 3.The application supports 25 different languages 
 4.You have many features in menu - share, help, image slide show, switch orientation, open new private option(images mixing from gallery or using camera), zoom in-out and change image position with no limits(to pause zoom and return images swiping just click on menu), reset image(back image to original size,position and no filter), application cleaning(cleaning application without deleting saving images). 
 5.Images Filters: You can apply these filters to images, you should use level to specify the filter level you want- levels between 1 to 25 and you can reset image from menu. 
 6.Setting image wallpaper: give you more options you can set original image wallpaper or set after using filters (set lock screen need android 7+) 
 7.Saving images: you can save original image, saving after applying filters, saving after change size and position(by zooming) and/or applying filters 
 8.In private new option you can use Shapes: These are a different shapes of your player image help you to create your own image and shapes list related to the image which you selected from images list and every image have 4 shapes so to change shapes back-select other image -menu-new then you will get another shapes. 
 9.In private new option Creating your image with camera: You can make your own image using camera and shapes also you can apply unlimited zoom in-out and change position to shapes as you want then press camera button (below screen) then wait about 3 seconds to create your image. 
 10.In private new option Creating your image with gallery: You can make your own image using layers list you have two layers top and bottom you can get them from gallery or shapes or both you can apply unlimited zoom in-out and change position to them as you want then click camera button (below screen) to create your image. 
 11.In private new option you can apply zoom in-out and change position to shapes and gallery images to make a perfect image. 
 12.After create your photo it will saving automatically but you can applying filters and save again after applying filters. 
 Enjoy and support us.
